' This Subroutine Sets the Variable "New_Name", so there is a text in the EditBox of "SaveAs_PopUp" Public Sub Set_New_Name New_name = "<Write Recipe Name Here.>" End Sub
' This Subroutine Sets the Variable "Add_Name", so there is a text in the EditBox of "Add_New_PopUp" Public Sub Set_Add Add_name = "<Write Recipe Name Here.>" End Sub
'This Subroutine Delete's the selected recipe Public Sub Delete Dim Del_Selected_template_Name As String Dim Del_recipe_Name As String
Del_recipe_Name = GetSelectedRecipe("Job1", "RecipeViewer0") Del_Selected_template_Name = GetSelectedRecipeTemplate("Job1","RecipeViewer0")
DeleteRecipe(Del_Selected_template_Name, Del_recipe_Name) End Sub
'This Subroutine lets you Add a new Recipe Public Sub Add Dim Add_Recipe_Name As String Dim Add_Selected_template_Name As String
Add_Recipe_Name = Add_Name Add_Selected_template_Name = GetSelectedRecipeTemplate("Job1","RecipeViewer0")
AddRecipe(Add_Selected_template_Name, Add_Recipe_Name)
SaveRecipe(Add_Selected_template_Name, Add_Recipe_Name)
Add_name = "<Write Recipe Name Here.>"
ClosePage("Add_New_Recipe") End Sub
'Load the correct data unto the screen when the user has selected a different recipe. Public Sub Recipe_Selected_Changed Dim Current_Selected_template_Name= GetSelectedRecipeTemplate("Job1","RecipeViewer0") Dim Current_recipe_Name = GetSelectedRecipe("Job1", "RecipeViewer0")
'If after an interval the current loaded recipe on the screen is not equal to the one selected by the user then load the new selected recipe If (Current_recipe_Name <> Selected_Recipe_Placeholder) Update_Recipe() End If End Sub
